import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" function Home() { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) const base_url = "https://dummyjson.com/products" const fetchData = async () => { const result = await fetch(base_url) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((products) => setProduct(products.products)) } console.log("product data...result", product) useEffect(() => { fetchData() }, []) return ( <>
Add a new item
{product.map((item) => ( ))}
ID title price Image
{item.id} {item.title} ${item.price}
) } export default Home
